LanguageData.ArachnePninety_Bullet.label: 冲锋枪子弹
LanguageData.ArachnePninety.label: 阿拉克涅冲锋枪
LanguageData.ArachnePninety.description: 阿拉克涅对于他们在几世纪前发现的外星武器的改进版.在中距离内拥有较低的伤害和较高的进度.
LanguageData.ArachnePninety.tools.0.label: 枪托
LanguageData.ArachnePninety.tools.1.label: 枪管
LanguageData.Arachne_Sword.label: 阿拉克涅剑
LanguageData.Arachne_Sword.description: 一把传统的阿拉克涅剑，拥有出色的切割性能.
LanguageData.Arachne_Sword.tools.0.label: 尖
LanguageData.Arachne_Sword.tools.1.label: 刃
LanguageData.Arachne_Scythe.label: 阿拉克涅战镰
LanguageData.Arachne_Scythe.description: 一把传统的阿拉克涅战镰，强力但笨重迟缓的近战武器.
LanguageData.Arachne_Scythe.tools.0.label: 握柄
LanguageData.Arachne_Scythe.tools.1.label: 刃
